content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia. Thank you for your interest in our apartment in Magdeburg. To begin our discussion regarding the rental price, let me first hear your proposed amount. Once you provide a figure, if it aligns with my expectations, I'll happily respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Should we not meet an agreement, I'll let you know my reason for not continuing, or if no consensus is found during the negotiation, I will say 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
